revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Repartir Experiencia |image = [[file:Bag_EXP_Share_Sprite.png]] |caption = Dibujo del ''Repartir Experiencia''. |dex = 50 |effect = Obtén más EXP de las batallas. }}
The '''EXP Share''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount of experience Pokémon gain. The EXP Share is unlocked after catching 50 unique Pokémon.
== Details ==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Nivel !! Efecto !! Requisitos de Mejora !! Coste de Mejora |- |0 || x1.15 EXP ganada || 500 Pokémon derrotados || Style="text-align:right;" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.18 EXP ganada || 500 Pokémon derrotados || Style="text-align:right;" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.21 EXP ganada || 1500 Pokémon derrotados || Style="text-align:right;" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.24 EXP ganada || 2500 Pokémon derrotados || Style="text-align:right;" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.27 EXP ganada || 5000 Pokémon derrotados || Style="text-align:right;" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.3 EXP ganada || N/A || Style="text-align:right;"| N/A |- |}
